name: deltastream
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing DeltaStream cloud resources.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`deltastream` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/deltastreaminc/terraform-provider-deltastream).

nodejs.packageDescription: A Pulumi package for creating and managing DeltaStream cloud resources.
nodejs.readme:
> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/deltastreaminc/terraform-provider-deltastream)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi-deltastream` repo](https://github.com/deltastreaminc/pulumi-deltastream/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-deltastream` repo](https://github.com/deltastreaminc/terraform-provider-deltastream/issues).

python.readme:
> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/deltastreaminc/terraform-provider-deltastream)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi-deltastream` repo](https://github.com/deltastreaminc/pulumi-deltastream/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-deltastream` repo](https://github.com/deltastreaminc/terraform-provider-deltastream/issues).

apiKey.description: API key. Can also be set via the DELTASTREAM_API_KEY environment variable

organization.description: DeltaStream organization ID. Can also be set via the DELTASTREAM_ORGANIZATION environment variable.

role.description:
DeltaStream role to use for managing resources and queries. Can also be set via the DELTASTREAM_ROLE environment
variable. Default: sysadmin

server.description: Server. Can also be set via the DELTASTREAM_SERVER environment variable

allConfigs.description: All topic configurations including any server set configurations

password.description: Password to use when authenticating with confluent schema registry

uris.description: List of host:port URIs to connect to the schema registry

username.description: Username to use when authenticating with confluent schema registry

key.description: Key to use when authenticating with confluent cloud schema registry

secret.description: Secret to use when authenticating with confluent cloud schema registry

uris.description: List of host:port URIs to connect to the schema registry

saslHashFunction.description: SASL hash function to use when authenticating with Confluent Kafka brokers

saslPassword.description: Password to use when authenticating with Apache Kafka brokers

saslUsername.description: Username to use when authenticating with Apache Kafka brokers

uris.description: List of host:port URIs to connect to the store

mskAwsRegion.description: AWS region where the Amazon MSK cluster is located

mskIamRoleArn.description: IAM role ARN to use when authenticating with Amazon MSK

saslHashFunction.description: SASL hash function to use when authenticating with Apache Kafka brokers

saslPassword.description: Password to use when authenticating with Apache Kafka brokers

saslUsername.description: Username to use when authenticating with Apache Kafka brokers

tlsDisabled.description: Specifies if the store should be accessed over TLS

tlsVerifyServerHostname.description: Specifies if the server CNAME should be validated against the certificate

uris.description: List of host:port URIs to connect to the store

accessKeyId.description: AWS IAM access key to use when authenticating with an Amazon Kinesis service

awsAccountId.description: AWS account ID to use when authenticating with an Amazon Kinesis service

secretAccessKey.description: AWS IAM secret access key to use when authenticating with an Amazon Kinesis service

uris.description: List of host:port URIs to connect to the store

password.description: Password to use when authenticating with a Postgres database

uris.description: List of host:port URIs to connect to the store

username.description: Username to use when authenticating with a Postgres database

clientKeyFile.description: Snowflake account's private key in PEM format

clientKeyPassphrase.description: Passphrase for decrypting the Snowflake account's private key

cloudRegion.description: Snowflake cloud region name, where the account resources operate in

roleName.description: Access control role to use for the Store operations after connecting to Snowflake

uris.description: List of host:port URIs to connect to the store

username.description: User login name for the Snowflake account

warehouseName.description: Warehouse name to use for queries and other store operations that require compute resource

fqn.description: Fully qualified name of the Object

updatedAt.description: Last update date of the object

owner.description: Owning role of the schema registry

provider.description:
The provider type for the deltastream package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

role.description:

variable. Default: sysadmin

pulumi:providers:deltastream/terraformCo.description: This function returns a Terraform config object with terraform-namecased keys,to be used with the Terraform Module Provider.
